Interface IController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Controller

    public interface IController

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addRequest(Request req)
      Store the request object in the requests priority queue.
      Course getCourse(java.lang.String courseDept, int courseNumber)
      Return the course object with data values that match the parameters received.
      void printClassList()
      Print classlists for all courses.
      void processRequests()
      Process all the requests as follows: if request can be granted, update the relevant classlist, update the class/course capacity, print out a message that the student who made that request has been successfully registered for that course.
      void readCourseFile()
      Read courses from input file and add each course to a LinkedList of courses
      void readRequestFile()
      Read each request from the request input file and use it to create a Request object.

    • Method Detail

      • readCourseFile

        void readCourseFile()
        Read courses from input file and add each course to a LinkedList of courses

      • readRequestFile

        void readRequestFile()
        Read each request from the request input file and use it to create a Request object.

      • addRequest

        void addRequest(Request req)
        Store the request object in the requests priority queue.
        Parameters:
        req - the request to be enqueued

      • processRequests

        void processRequests()
        Process all the requests as follows: if request can be granted, update the relevant classlist, update the class/course capacity, print out a message that the student who made that request has been successfully registered for that course. Else, print out a message that student could not be registered.

      • getCourse

        Course getCourse(java.lang.String courseDept,
                 int courseNumber)
        Return the course object with data values that match the parameters received.
        Parameters:
        courseDept - the department of the course
        courseNumber - the number of the course
        Returns:
        the course object with data values that match the parameters received

      • printClassList

        void printClassList()
        Print classlists for all courses.
